document_data.name: ''Cutlass of the Golden Gulf''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Cutlass of the [[Golden Gulf]]''''' was a magical weapon that could be found in [[Zakhara]], the [[Land of Fate]]. It was favored by [[Corsair (kit)|corsairs]] and other sailors.{{Cite dragon/179/Wonders of the Land of Fate}}
document_data.Powers: This weapon provided the wielder with small enhancements to their fighting skill, but its main power was that it allowed the wielder to breath underwater so long as the weapon was in their hand.
